text: @WhiteHouse Still - even so and it will be a hard mountain to climb, we will not forget your recklessness.  You created this situation.  It is your responsibility. What will you do in the second term? Nuclear war? Donald Trump is a NO SHOW during the first months of the Coronavirus! Get Out!
